title: Meghan King Edmonds shrieks as a goat attempts to grab milk bottle
text:
Meghan King Edmonds has shared hilarious video of herself freaking out after a goat jumped on her at the pumpkin patch.

In the video, the reality star, 35, smiles from ear to ear as she holds her daughter Aspen, two, and son Hart, one, while posing beside the livestock.

That all changes once the goat stands up on it's hind legs in an effort to grab a milk bottle from Aspen's hands.

That's a nay from her! Meghan King Edmonds has shared hilarious video of herself freaking out after a goat attempted to grab a milk bottle at the pumpkin patch

Suddenly, Meghan's smile disappears as she begins backing away from the animal with a look of complete shock on her face.

Aspen isn't too happy about the goat, either, and holds the bottle closer.

As Meghan cowers away from the goat, her third child, Hayes, one, is seen sitting calm as can be on the floor beside the animals.

'Some family memories will never be forgotten,' she captioned the video, posted Sunday. '#grantsfarm #gangsallhere (can we talk about our unphased and fearless leader, Hayes?! Who thinks everything is just fine on the ground underneath these goats! ...Or on top of him, eating his clothes... he is NOT bothered. Meanwhile Aspen, Hart, and I are still recovering from our panic.)'

Oh no! Poor Aspen was not happy by the goat's behavior either

Calm and cool: Meanwhile, Meghan's third child, Hayes, was not bothered by the goats

Overall, the trip to the pumpkin patch seemed to go well for the Real Housewives Of Orange County star.

Meghan posted a few more snaps of her youngster Hart enjoying his time with the animals.

The next day, she shared video of her child Hart at physical therapy.

Loving it: In fact, Hayes was quite fascinated by the animals

Back at it: On Monday, the reality star took her son Hart to physical therapy

Meghan has been candidly sharing her son Hart's progress in his therapy after doctors diagnosed him with brain damage, known clinically as periventricular leukomalacia.

She talked about the brain damage diagnosis this past July on her blog.

'This is a heavy challenge as a mother: where do we go from here?' she said. 'This is where: one foot in front of the other.'

Meghan shares her three children with her husband and former Major League baseball player Jim Edmonds.

Earlier this year, Jim was accused of having an affair with a woman named Jennifer McFelia Villegas. He denied getting physical with her.
